base_frame.description: The undistortion algorithm is based on a base frame, which must be the same as the twist frame.

use_imu.description: Use IMU angular velocity, otherwise, use twist angular velocity.

use_3d_distortion_correction.description: Use 3d distortion correction algorithm, otherwise, use 2d distortion correction algorithm.

distance_ratio.description: distance ratio between consecutive points to determine is they belong to the same walk

object_length_threshold.description: minimum object length to be considered a valid cluster in meters

num_points_threshold.description: threshold on the number of points in a walk to determine if it corresponds to a cluster

crop_box.min_x.description: An array in which each element is the minimum x value in a crop box

crop_box.min_y.description: An array in which each element is the minimum y value in a crop box

crop_box.min_z.description: An array in which each element is the minimum z value in a crop box

crop_box.max_x.description: An array in which each element is the maximum x value in a crop box

crop_box.max_y.description: An array in which each element is the maximum y value in a crop box

crop_box.max_z.description: An array in which each element is the maximum z value in a crop box
